sentences.en: 'see if you can get some nice asparagus,'she added. " I'll cook it for dinner. "
sentences.cn: “ 你看看能不能买些好芦笋, " 她补充说, " 我要用来做晚饭.

sentences.en: Anton the chef concocts a sensual coupling of lobster and asparagus.
sentences.cn: 厨师安东用龙虾和芦笋搭配，制作出了一道口感很好的菜肴。

sentences.en: Asparagus is reputed to be an aphrodisiac.
But then again, so does asparagus.
sentences.cn: 但话又说回来，芦笋也是如此。

sentences.en: Effects of Several Factors on Rooting of Asparagus officinalis L.
sentences.cn: 与几种因素对白芦笋试管苗生根的影响>>相似的文献.

sentences.en: In some degree, all the hatches are suitable for loading asparagus.
sentences.cn: 从某种程度上看, 所有舱都适合装芦笋.

sentences.en: It is right at the drip line of the tree. So when it rains, all the rain drips down right on the asparagus.
sentences.cn: 它们刚好种在大树的滴水线下，所以每当下雨的时候，所有雨滴都刚好落在芦笋上。

sentences.en: Memories of the first asparagus and carrots he ate from a garden years before led him to start growing produce on the roof of his landmarked brownstone in Park Slope, Brooklyn, six or seven years ago.
sentences.cn: 记忆的六，七年前第一次在菜园里吃芦笋和胡萝卜的经验，带领他开始在屋顶上种菜，他在地标式的赤褐色砂石房子位于布鲁克林区的公园斜坡 。

sentences.en: Now British asparagus is in season.
Now, there is a choice of vegetables, asparagus or fresh peas.
sentences.cn: 哦, 还有蔬菜, 您选芦笋,还是鲜豌豆?

sentences.en: The photosynthetic characteristics of asparagus bean have been studied.
sentences.cn: 以鄂豇豆二号品种为材料,研究了豇豆的光合特性.

sentences.en: The saponins extracted from the stem of Asparagus officinalis L.
sentences.cn: 芦笋皂苷是以芦笋下脚料为原料提取出来的一种糖甙化合物.

sentences.en: The tiny asparagus and potato plants didn't arrive on a spaceship.
sentences.cn: 那些细小的芦笋与马铃薯并不是搭宇宙飞船来的.

sentences.en: To quell inflammation, eat antioxidant - rich foods as berries, oranges, and asparagus.
sentences.cn: 为了平息炎症, 吃富含抗氧化剂的食品,如草莓, 橙子, 和芦笋.

sentences.en: Trim any tough or woody stalks from the asparagus.
sentences.cn: 剪掉芦笋上粗硬或老掉的梗子。

sentences.en: We are interested in importing canned asparagus from your country.
sentences.cn: 我们有意从你方进口罐装芦笋.

sentences.en: We have some asparagus for lunch.
Well, get a choice of fresh asparagus, green beans and grilled tomatoes.
sentences.cn: 我们有各种新鲜芦笋, 青豆和炙番茄.

trans.tran_en: a long thin green vegetable with a point at one end
